name: Tunnel Twister (JeffCube)
description:
Tunnel Twisting Time!

Twist your way through waves of bombs and try to reach for a high score!

Patch Notes v0.2.0:

  • Added particle effects to bombs.
  • Player is now destroyed when hitting a bomb. 
  • Bombs now explode and push around player pieces.
  • Updated UI appearance
  • Added Options Menu so that the user can adjust the volume and rotation speed.

Credits:

  • Game Developer: JeffCube
  • Programmer: JeffCube
  • Game Music: Fallen Leaves by 陽菜/Hina
  • Sound Effects: Free Sound Effects Pack: by Olivier Girardot
  • Particle Effects: Unity Particle Pack 5.x
  • Dogica / Dogica Pixel Font: Roberto Mocci

This game was originally created as part of Trijam #154. 

You can see the jam post here: https://itch.io/jam/trijam-154/rate/1378903

And the original game here: https://jeffcube.itch.io/tunnel-twister
